snippet: As concerns about Greece eased, European ministers promptly won additional concessions from Spain.
abstract: European Union finance ministers win an agreement from Spain to take additional steps to reduce its bulging budget deficit in order to ease the latest threat to the euro zone, now that Greece has agreed with a majority of its private creditors on terms that will release bailout money.
lead_paragraph: As concerns about Greece eased, European ministers promptly won additional concessions from Spain.

headline.seo: Spain Agrees to a Further Deficit Reduction
headline.main: Spain Agrees to a Further Deficit Reduction
headline.print_headline: Spain Agrees to a Further Deficit Reduction
